title: AMS boosts offer for Osram in latest volley in bidding war
text: AMS has boosted its takeover offer to buy German lighting group Osram to €4.5bn including debt as it looks to end a multi-month bidding war against private equity rivals. It also declared the bid its “best and final” offer, ahead of an expiry date of midnight on October 1 for Osram shareholders to accept the sweetened offer. that has seen AMS fight for control of Osram against Bain Capital, which initially bid for the business along with the Carlyle Group and is now working with Advent International.
